data.text: @hispaniccosmist Even the brain dead sportscasters can’t and don’t defend it.  Lockdown collapsing in a whimper of mocked measures…
@WBarlaam @hispaniccosmist Biggest beneficiary of the trade so far imo
@hoodedsnuffoid @hispaniccosmist It's also cool that Maxey is barely bigger than AI and plays like he doesn't gaf, while enjoying himself.
@WBarlaam @hispaniccosmist Almost forgot what it was like to have a player that could dribble AND shoot.
@hoodedsnuffoid @hispaniccosmist Same here. Plus, while I miss Simmon's defense, it's nice having a point guard who actually plays the position.
@WBarlaam @hispaniccosmist Ditto. Hate this mandate shit but I’m a Sixers fan lol

@hispaniccosmist This is only being done b/c the restaurants are dying without tourists. They still want to f-over the people who live here.

What’s going to be curious to see is how many places maintain the restrictions, and whether the restrictors revolt when it occurs.

@hispaniccosmist NYC is a f-ing joke. 

I’d be in the same situation too if I actually worked for someone else. Which is why I give Irving lots of respect. I said no, but my job wasn’t at stake.
@hispaniccosmist It's retxrted, but as a fan of another franchise, I'll have to accept it as something that removes another potential impediment to my team's progress.
